content_blocks_page.title: Let work find you.
content_blocks_page.content: If you’re in the construction game in Australia then you’re in the right place. We’ve done the hard work to make sure you can get the ‘best fit’ hires in just a few easy steps. Create profile > post job >  engage with workers.

question.title: What is Build Labour?
question.text: Build Labour is a jobs app for employers and workers in Construction.

question.title: How much does it cost?
question.text: During Covid-19, we have a special $99 fixed placement fee.  As we add more automation features, we’ll be moving to a subscription with prices to suit companies of all sizes.  Recruiting relevant labour has never been this easy or this efficient.

question.title: Who's it for?
question.text: Build Labour is just for the construction community. No one else. Our database of workers is growing by the day - and they all have a construction background.

question.title: Why should I use it?
question.text: You can use it on your smartphone, tablets or computers to connect with a great talent base of just construction talent.  Less time hiring, more time delivering your projects.

question.title: Do the workers work for Build Labour?
question.text: No. Build Labour acts as a marketplace bringing together the two sides – workers and employers.  How you hire them is up to you, but we expect you to always follow the law.
